title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files in the File menu MRU list do not appear when the application is reopened.
EB: The files in the File menu MRU list should be persisted between sessions.
SR: Implement the IPersistableElement to ensure that the files in the MRU list are persisted between sessions.
